title: Fun with Robosaurs in Horizon: Forbidden West
description:
It's feast or famine out there, games-wise, and this week's a FEAST: We're talking about Sony's newest first-party blockbuster, Horizon: Forbidden West. Also, Destiny 2's new expansion is out! And it's pretty good! 

Other games discussed: Zelda: Breath of the Wild, Magic the Gathering Arena, Hollow Knight, Final Fantasy Tactics Advance, Celeste, Terraria, The Room
author: thebestiesbizemail@gmail.com (Griffin McElroy, Justin McElroy, Russ Frushtick)
